pageProduct.name: Pain Away Hand Warmers Value Bonus Pack 6 Pack
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Hand Warmers that are odourless, ultra thin, air activated, non-medicated, ready to use, safe natural heat

Warnings

Hand Warmer - Burn hazard. This warmer delivers a high amount of strong heat. Immediately remove hand warmer if it is too hot or uncomfortable and check skin periodically.                                                 Regular Heat Patch - Due to very high temeratures that this heat patch can reach, do not place heat patch directly on your skin. Heat Patch only to be worn on your clothes.                                 Stop using in the case of: discomfort, irritation, excessive feeling of heat, burning sensation, swelling, reddening or any other persistent change in the skin. Burn hazard: this heat patch delivers a high amount of stong heat. Immediately remove the patch if it is too hot or uncomfortable and check the skin periodically. Do not use in the case of: application of other heating products, creams or ointments at the same time. Injured or particularly sensitive skin, bruises and swellings occured in the last 48 hours. Absence of careful supervision is required when used by the elderly, children, the handicapped and those with sensitive skin. Using whilst sleeping or with prolonged pressure against patch. People with allergies, diabetes, frostbite, scars, open wounds, bruising, swelling, sensitive skin, paralysis, nerve damage or circulatory problems and people who cannot apply or remove heat patch by themseleves should not use this product undless directed by a health professional. Exposure to magnetic resonance (MRI) tests. Associated with cortisone-based topical products or other similar topical products. Applicaiton during sporting activities. Leakage of the contents of the heating elements and/or damaged product. Seek medical advise in the case of patients with circulation problems, cardiac disease, rheumatoid arthritis, diabetes and pregnancy. For external use only. Do not ingest as ingredients can be harmful. In the case of accidental swallowing, seek medical advice immediately. In the case of direct contact (skin and eyes) with the material contained in the product, rinse with plently of water and seek medical advise immediately. Single use only. Do not attempt to reheat patch in microwave or oven. Keep out of the reach of children and pets. This product can cause burns. The area to which the patch is applied should be checked periodically to see if there are burns or irritation. Do not use on parts of the body that are sensitive to heat to avoid the risk of burns. Do not use on the same area of the body for more than 8 hours in a 24 hour period. In patients above the age of 55 the risk of burns increases. Do not use with other skin medication or heat sources. Do not cut, massage, fold or wet the patch. Do not use if the patch is damaged or torn.  

Common Uses

Pain Away Hand Warmers provide targeted long lasting, sustained heat when applied. Heat therapy increases blood flor to the affected area providing oxygen and nutirents to aid the muscle healing process. 

Directions

Hand Warmer - Do not open outer package until ready to use. Remove warmers from outer package; shake to activate. Do not open, punture or tear warmer. For maximum efficiency, place warmer in pocket or gloves. Warmer heats up in 15-30 mins. If heat decreases, expose warmer to air and shake. After use, dispose with regular garbage. In the case that a hand warmer heat patch causes discomfort, irritation, burning sensation, reddening or swelling stop use immediately.                                                                        Regular Heat Patch - When ready, take the Heat Patch out of the protective packet (external use only) and remove the protective layer. Place the patch on the painful area ensuring that its entire surface adheres onto clothing (it can take up to 10 minutes to reach the expected temperature). Do not wear on the same area for more than 8 hours in a 24 hour period. If using for period pain (external use only), place the product with the adhesive part on underwear and not directly on the skin. On flexible joints and or for added stability, use dressing tape to hold teh patch in place.
